subject: Re: New events changes
preview: Thanks Heath! And thanks for getting all these changes in today. I will send all final amendments on the one email along with the function pack  Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director    7/23 Baran

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath! And thanks for getting all these changes in today. I will send all final amendments on the one email along with the function pack

Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director



7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

michelle@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

please think of the environment before you print this email

Hi Michelle, 

We have sorted out the home page boxes for you now.

Thank you Chris!

I will have a proper look through at all the changes.

I will be able to send function pack soon.

One thing on home page - the divider has disappeared with the change ie the two boxes have merged.

See screen shot x

Thanks so much!

Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director

https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo



7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

michelle@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

please think of the environment before you print this email

Hi Chris,

No nothing received from that time sorry!

Please resend if not too much trouble.

Thanks,
Lewis.

Hi Lewis, 

Thanks, can you please confirm our previous email was received? Time stamped 5.01pm AEST.

Sorry just resending for Heath and Michelle.

See below 😊

Hi Lewis,

Thanks for your email. 

1. From your screenshots, it appears you may be looking at a cached version of the website. I have attached 2x screenshots of how it should look. 

2. Confirming we have removed the italics. If there a specific page you would like us follow, please provide the link and we can have it match 100%

Most welcome and speak soon,

Hi Chris, I'm Lewis and assisting Michelle with marketing at the moment. Thanks for providing us info on the updates! Just a couple of small issues I've noticed on web only (mobile not affected) I've screenshotted them and attached
  • Heading not lined up with text or drop-down menu on the two event pages, can it be in line please 🙂
  • 'Enquire today' doesn't seem to follow the same formatting as it's underlined and in italics, could it be altered to match rest of the website formatting please
Thanks again! Lewis.
Closed, logged 1 hour in harvest, related tickets are 72180/72175.

Hi Michelle,

Thanks for your email.

We are pleased to let you know that the changes you requested have been completed. The only exception is the update that relates to the "events pack".

You can view the new events pages on the following links:
https://www.lovefish.com.au/eofy-2023/
https://www.lovefish.com.au/vivid-at-love-fish-2023/

Please let me know if there are any further updates.

We are standing by for the "events pack".
@chris @jaime I think this ticket is related to ticket 72175

Morning Team,


These are all the changes for now - with the events pack to follow later today.
Please let me know if it's possible to get these changes done today.
We have invites to send out but cannot proceed until online updates are complete.


Thanks so much!


M x










TO START


Please see website edit suggestions


Please see copy for the 2 new events


I have attached beverage packs for the new links


Please see changes for existing events page




I AM FINALISING A NEW EVENTS PACK - IN THE MEANTIME IF YOU WANT TO JUST POP THE GROUP MENU PDF IN THE NEW LINKS DISCUSSED WE CAN UPDATE WHEN PACK IS COMPLETED.


I need to attach photos for the 2 new events pages


  • existing events page - new header photo image 011
  • the 2 new event tabs - vivid please use photo lendlease 1812, EOFY offer please use image 049


CHANGES TO EXISTING EVENTS PAGE


  • Photo changed from 3 girls to image 011
  • Photo copy change to - 'functions & events at love.fish'
  • Please remove the two columns and work to just one
  • Main copy first under header 'love events at love.fish Barangaroo'
  • Main copy remains as is - only changes are 125 guests outside and 25 guests inside and tables of 8 or more ranging from $69 to $85 per person.
  • Keep the 3 black menu tabs as is but please ADD a fourth box - position at top and mark as VIEW FUNCTION PACK. Please change last box marked drinks menu to BEVERAGE PACKS ( I have attached the menu to be linked here)
  • Instead of the 3 standalone photos can you make a carousel of images?? If so, please advise and I will send through more photos
  • Then please add the enquiry form across full width of page
  • Then delete the terms and conditions please - so page ends with enquiry form.




Ok this is def a good start!

I will send through function pack when ready x


Thank you!!!!




Michelle Grand-Milkovic
 Founding Director
https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo


7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700
michelle@lovefish.com.au lovefish.com.au
